bike.description: Specialized FSR technology optimized for BRAIN shock, M4 Alloy w/ ORE technology, women's specific geometry, fully butted and manipulated, full sealed cartridge bearing pivots, disc tabs only, 90mm travel, replaceable derailleur hanger

Specialized XC Low Rise bar, 6066 Alloy, 6 degree upsweep, 8 degree backsweep, 640mm width
Specialized MTB grip, black, double density Kraton
